lessons.subject: Introduction to Spanish
lessons.intro:
Welcome to Big Sneeze's Spanish course! To start off we would like to say, Hola! That means "Hello" in Spanish!
Some basic greetings are:
keyphrases: Como te llamas? : What is your name?

questions.question: "Hello" in spanish is: _______
questions.options: Hola  |  Como te llamas  |  Buenas dias  |  Buenas Noches

questions.question: "What is your name" in Spanish is: __________
questions.options: Quando Quenta  |  Como te llamas  |  Buenas dias  |  Buenas noches

questions.question:
Fill in the blank to say "Good Morning"
Buenas ______

lessons.subject: Common Spanish Phrases
lessons.intro: In this lesson, we'll explore some commonly used Spanish phrases that will help you in daily conversations.

exercies.question: "I'm sorry" in Spanish is: _________
exercies.options: Gracias  |  Lo siento  |  De nada  |  Por favor

exercies.question: What is the correct phrase to say "Thank you" in Spanish?
exercies.options: Por favor  |  Gracias  |  Lo siento  |  De nada

exercies.question: How do you respond to someone thanking you by saying "You're welcome"?
exercies.options: Gracias  |  Por favor  |  De nada  |  Lo siento
